title: Herb-scented ham and pea soup
ingredients: ['1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 small carrot, diced', '2 garlic cloves, sliced', '1 leek, chopped', '1 celery stick, diced', '2 tbsp chopped parsley', '1 potato, peeled and diced', '100 g (3½ oz) lean boiled or baked ham, diced', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) shelled fresh or frozen peas', '½ tsp dried herbes de Provence, or to taste', '1 litre (1¾ pints) vegetable stock, preferably home-made light, or a mixture of half stock and half water', '3 large lettuce leaves, finely shredded', '2 tbsp whipping cream', 'salt and pepper']
